user_question: How can IoT devices be used to improve energy efficiency in a smart home?
final_answer: IoT devices can improve energy efficiency in a smart home by using smart thermostats to optimize heating and cooling, smart lighting systems to reduce electricity usage, and smart plugs to monitor and control the power consumption of appliances.
